articles.title: The latest ChatGPT search upgrades make it better for shopping
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched new shopping upgrades for ChatGPT Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users. The upgrade includes features like Search in WhatsApp, improved citations, and trending and autocomplete search functionalities, which are rolled out to improve user experience and information accuracy.

articles.title: Bucks' Season on the BRINK entering Game 5  Can Milwaukee Pull Off a Miracle?
articles.summary: WeAreIowa has launched the WeAreIowa app, enabling users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: NIU Unveils Latest Electric Scooter Lineup with Enhanced Power and Extended Range for Urban Mobility  Apr. 28, 2025 23:08
articles.summary: NIU has launched the KQi 200 Series, featuring two new electric scooters: the KQi 200P and KQi 200F. The KQi 200P, priced at $649, offers enhanced power and stability, while the KQi 200F, priced at $699, is designed for portability and convenience with a foldable design.

articles.title: How to Create Profitable Videos with Vidnoz AI without Breaking the Bank?
articles.author: Stephanie Maris
articles.summary: Vidnoz AI is introducing an AI video generator service. It features 1500+ AI avatars, 1380+ AI voices, and 2800+ templates to create engaging videos. The service simplifies video creation by transforming prompts into professional-quality videos with customizable elements such as color schemes, avatars, and voiceovers.

articles.title: 'My new best friend': Zap up this iRobot Roomba vac/mop for a rare $100 (65% off)
articles.summary: iRobot's Roomba Robot Vacuum & Mop is on sale at Amazon with a nearly 65% discount. The 2-in-1 appliance vacuums and mops floors simultaneously, and users can schedule cleanings and view reports via the iRobot Home App.

articles.title: UGG's new GoldenGlow slide is so comfortable you'll never want to take it off
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: UGG has launched a new sandal for the spring season.

articles.title: The Best Bissell Pet Hair Vacuum To De-Fur Your Home
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: BISSELL introduced the PowerClean FurFinder, which is their newest stick vacuum.

articles.title: Kar's Nuts, Dunkin' roll out trail mixes
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A collaboration introduced two new products.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands Launches Fort's AI-Based Pest Control App on the Apple App Store  Apr. 28, 2025 21:18
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands' subsidiary, Fort Products Limited, launched its AI-powered pest control mobile app on the Apple App Store. The app allows users to identify household pests and offers customized treatment recommendations, featuring Fort's pest control solutions. An Android version is also progressing and expected on Google Play soon.

articles.title: OpenAI rolls out new shopping features with ChatGPT search update
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: OpenAI updated ChatGPT's web search capabilities on Monday to improve online shopping by providing users with personalized product recommendations including images, reviews, and direct purchase links. The update, available in GPT-4o, will offer tailored product recommendations across fashion, beauty, home goods, and electronics and exclude advertisements. OpenAI aims to challenge Alphabet's search dominance by providing a more user-focused alternative.

articles.title: Trader Joe's fans are racing to ‘snatch up' $4.99 new ‘crispy' and ‘creamy' item which doesn't look like it seems
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has launched several new products, including Japanese Mini Taiyaki, Piquant Popcorn, Cinnamon Danish Twist Pastry, Thai Peanut Satay Sauce, Brown Sugar Boba Mochi, Dulce de Leche Ice Cream and a rich night cream. The Japanese Mini Taiyaki is a limited-time frozen treat, while other items like the Thai Peanut Satay Sauce are sourced from specific regions to offer unique flavors. Customer reactions have been varied, with some expressing excitement and others confusion about the nature of certain items.

articles.title: ChatGPT Is Taking On Google Shopping—but With One Key Difference
articles.author: Brent Dirks
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new shopping feature to ChatGPT that allows users to shop directly from web searches. The chatbot will provide product recommendations, images, reviews, and direct links to purchase items, initially focusing on fashion, beauty, home goods, and electronics. Unlike Google Shopping, ChatGPT's results will be organic and not based on paid placements and subscribers of the Pro and Plus tiers will soon be able to integrate the recently improved memory option with the shopping feature.

articles.title: Primark's £16 midaxi dressers shoppers are 'running to buy'
articles.author: Katrina Chilver
articles.summary: Primark has introduced the Slinky Midaxi Dress, a £16 jersey dress available in blue or gold, sizes XXS to XL. The dress features a sleeveless silhouette and ruching at the waist and is available for Click and Collect orders on Primark's website and for purchase in-store.

articles.title: Move Over, Google? ChatGPT Launches New Shopping Features
articles.author: S.E. Slack
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new online shopping experience within ChatGPT. This update provides users with unsponsored recommendations, images, and product reviews across categories like electronics, home goods, beauty, and fashion. The shopping updates are rolling out to ChatGPT Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users.

articles.title: Rustica Foods Celebrates 25 Years of Excellence and Innovation in the Pizza Industry
articles.author: Rustica Foods
articles.summary: Rustica Foods Inc. is launching new Detroit-style pan pizzas under the Rustica brand in 2025. This new product line is entering a rapidly growing segment of the Canadian market and was selected for SIAL Innovation 2025.

articles.title: 6 Best Hair Powder For Men: Add Texture And Volume To Your Style
articles.author: Owen Gough
articles.summary: Several brands offer hair powders for men that provide a flexible yet firm grip on hair without the stiff, crunchy look of gels. These powders add texture and depth, are useful for styling longer hair, and come in various formulations with masculine scents and hydrating properties. Grooming editors have curated lists of top hair powder options available.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Pricing leaked ahead of launch
articles.author: Hassan Naqvi
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, a premium smartphone with a slim design. Leaked information indicates it will come in 256GB and 512GB storage options, priced at CAD $1,678.99 and $1,858.99, respectively, and will be available in Jet Black and Silver Titanium colors.

articles.title: OpenAI Lets Users Go Shopping With ChatGPT, Challenging Google
articles.author: Rachel Metz
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a shopping feature within ChatGPT, allowing users to compare products and make purchases via links to external websites. The feature is currently available for electronics, fashion, beauty, and home goods categories and to all of ChatGPT's 500 million active users. This update puts ChatGPT in competition with consumer recommendation and review sites.

articles.title: ChatGPT is getting better for shopping
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: OpenAI is rolling out shopping updates to ChatGPT for Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users. These updates include product cards with images, prices, and star ratings, and a sidebar similar to Google Shopping with details from user reviews across sites like Amazon and Best Buy.  Users can also ask ChatGPT specific questions about products directly through the 'Ask about this' button.

articles.title: OpenAI Leans Into Shopping With ChatGPT Upgrades
articles.author: Meghan Hall
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched new shopping capabilities within ChatGPT to help users shop and compare items more efficiently. The updated ChatGPT includes features like aggregating customer reviews, providing comparative analysis on price or features, sharing direct links for purchases, and incorporating product photos. The new capabilities are currently rolling out to free, Pro, and Plus users of ChatGPT-4o.

articles.title: The Creative Optimization Survival Guide
articles.author: Adobe Advertising
articles.summary: Companies are adopting generative AI to automate creative production, optimize ads, and personalize content across various digital channels. Platforms like Adobe Advertising are helping brands to gain better control of their advertising spend and drive better performance for their business. This adoption allows for faster ad creation, continuous testing, and data-driven optimization, ultimately improving engagement and ROI.

articles.title: How serious do you take your passwords?
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Boox has announced the launch of two new E Ink tablets: the Go 7 and the Go Color 7 Gen II.

articles.title: Next's £28 jeggings are so much 'better than jeans' shoppers have every colour
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next is offering the 'Fly Fasten Jersey Denim Leggings' priced at £28. The jeggings are available in black and dark blue colors, petite and regular sizes and are made from a soft and stretchy cotton blend. The black model has a 4.5 rating from across 54 reviews

articles.title: What Marketers Are Getting Wrong About AI
articles.author: Fast Company Executive Board
org: Boston Consulting Group Harvard Business School
articles.summary: Method1, an advertising agency, is leveraging AI as a creative partner, not just an efficiency tool. They are using AI to develop in-house tools and generate new media capabilities, exemplified by their approach to custom web apps for media buying which enhances the confidence of both Method1 and its clients that their media budgets are being put to best use.

articles.title: Writer Releases New Adaptive Reasoning LLM Palmyra X5 With 1M Context Window to Scale Next Era of Enterprise AI Agents
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Writer released Palmyra X5, a new adaptive reasoning foundation model with a 1 million token context window. Palmyra X5 is now available in Amazon Bedrock through Amazon Web Services (AWS).

articles.title: ZZ's Ice Cream Puffs adds sweetness to life
articles.summary: ZZ's Ice Cream Puffs introduces their ice cream puffs. These puffs add sweetness to life.

articles.title: 7 Thoughtful Gift Ideas for People Who Say They Want Nothing
articles.summary: Eva Sparkling Red Wine, a non-alcoholic option with no added sugars or artificial preservatives, is available for purchase at Drinks.ng for ₦5,000. Tobacco Collection Rich Warm Addictive 2021 by Zara, an Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men, features notes of rum, peony, and bourbon vanilla and is available on Amazon for $43.39.

articles.title: Domino's is pleased with launch of its stuffed-crust pizza despite a cooler economy
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: The company launched a stuffed-crust pizza late in the first quarter. Its performance has met the company's expectations.

articles.title: Ottocast Introduces New-Gen Android Car Box NanoAI, Anchors New Era of Vehicle Intelligence
articles.author: OTTOCAST CORPORATION LTD
articles.summary: Ottocast has launched its new-generation Android car box NanoAI. This device integrates AI emotive display, voice assistant, CloudSIM, and the Android 13 system. The product aims to provide users with an AI-enabled in-vehicle experience.

articles.title: LG's refreshed QNED Evo LCD TVs arrive in May
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: LG is launching its 2025 QNED Evo premium LCD TVs in May, featuring True Wireless tech for 4K content transmission previously exclusive to OLED TVs. The QNED Evo lineup is powered by LG's Alpha AI processor and includes Dynamic QNED Color solution. The new AI Magic Remote enables personalized voice requests and the TVs also function as smart home hubs through LG ThinQ and Google Home.

articles.title: SmartLinks Launches Self-Serve Platform, Empowering Brands with Next-Generation Consumer Product Digitisation and Connected Packaging with QR Codes Powered by GS1
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: SmartLinks has launched its new self-serve platform, designed to help brands, manufacturers, and retailers utilize QR codes and NFC technology. This platform is meant to assist businesses in meeting upcoming Digital Product Passport (DPP) regulations. The platform offers features like creating interactive consumer experiences, providing intelligent product information, and delivering localized and personalized offers.

articles.title: Nissan's new N7 EV launches in China with +380 miles range and it starts at under $17,000
articles.author: Peter Johnson
articles.summary: Nissan has launched its new electric vehicle, the N7, in China. The N7 electric sedan starts at $16,500 and offers a driving range of up to 388 miles (625 km). The EV is equipped with smart driving technology and features a 15.6" infotainment system and is powered by a Snapdragon 8295P Qualcomm chip.

articles.title: 'Game changing' portable outdoor airer 'is worth every penny'
articles.author: Laura Mckenna Audience Writer
articles.summary: Minky introduced the Freestanding Portable Rotary Airer, available on Amazon for £39. This compact airer offers 15 meters of drying space and a sturdy tripod base for outdoor or indoor use. Customer reviews indicate satisfaction with its sturdiness and capacity, making it a convenient laundry solution.

articles.title: China's DeepSeek that created havoc in the US tech industry is hiring for an ‘urgent' job
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: DeepSeek is preparing to launch its R2 model in the coming weeks. They are also seeking product management and design roles to create the "next generation of intelligent product experience" centered on large language models, signaling a strategic pivot from pure research toward commercialization.

articles.title: Radiance awaits: Indie Lee launches bronzing drops, and we're obsessed
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Indie Lee launched Bronzing Drops on April 1 as part of its Hints Collection. The Bronzing Drops are a skin-enhancing serum designed as a safe alternative to sunbathing, offering buildable color and skincare benefits. The formula contains ingredients like avocado oil, niacinamide, squalane, aloe, and vitamin E, aimed at providing hydration, improved texture, and even skin tone.

articles.title: Have You Seen This? Umbrella salesman knows what consumers want in a commercial
articles.author: Deseret Digital Media
articles.summary: Lei Penglin uses a short, one-take video to showcase the features of his umbrellas, including wind resistance, flashlight functionality, and rain protection. He uses social media to customize umbrella and expand customer base.

articles.title: ASDA reveals plan to open huge new store - and it's not a supermarket
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: ASDA plans to launch a stand-alone George store in Leeds. The store will stock clothing, homeware, toys, and baby items. The store will feature the new George Spring/Summer 2025 collection and celebrity collaborations.

articles.title: This $200 Motorola phone has no business being this good for the price
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the 2025 Moto G smartphone, available for $200. The Moto G features a 6.7-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Atmos-tuned speakers, and a long-lasting battery.

articles.title: ‘Natural glow' fake tan alternative has 40% off and arrives in time for mini heatwave
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: This Works Perfect Legs Skin Miracle, a tinted body serum for an instant glow, is on sale at Amazon and Lookfantastic. Vita Liberata's Body Blur, a similar product, is also discounted, while Isle of Paradise Glow Clear Self Tanning Mousse offers a longer-lasting tan.

articles.title: Quick-drying cleaner that 'brings up carpets like new' plummets by £108
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Vax SpinScrub Power Plus carpet cleaner by £108.83 as part of a spring sale, making it available for £141.16. Shark's StainStriker Stain & Spot Cleaner is also on sale on the brand's website for £120.00.

articles.title: Shoppers in Their 50s Credit This $15 Skin Tint for Achieving a 'Light Glow'
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: NYX has launched Buttermelt Glaze Soft Glow Skin Tint, a $16 skincare-infused formula featuring mango butter, shea butter, and niacinamide with SPF 30. Shoppers with mature skin are praising the skin tint for its lightweight, long-lasting, and easy application, providing a natural, 'glazed donut' finish that lasts up to 12 hours.

articles.title: NIU Unveils Latest Electric Scooter Lineup with Enhanced Power and Extended Range for Urban Mobility
articles.author: NIU Technologies
articles.summary: Niu Technologies launched the KQi 200 Series, two new electric scooters designed for premium performance and comfort. This series builds upon the KQi2 Pro model, offering an upgraded motor, extended range, and a minimalist frame. The KQi 200 Series is available at select Best Buy stores and online.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Packaging Idea for Children's Bodywash (BDH-387)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor, with the help of InventHelp, developed a new packaging design for children's bath products that functions as both a container and a bath toy. This 2-in-1 design aims to reduce plastic waste and the need for separate bath toys, offering a cost-effective and environmentally conscious solution. The design is available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers.

articles.title: Nothing CMF Phone 2 Pro debuts with triple cameras, modular accessories, and charger in the box
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Nothing is introducing the Phone 2 Pro, promising a unique, powerful, and fun user experience.

articles.title: Antonia Saint NY Heels Unveils New Spring/Summer 2025 Vicki Collection Designed for Real Life in ...
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: A new footwear collection features timeless designs. This collection features kitten heels and elevated sandals. The products incorporate patented comfort technology designed to move with the wearer.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a $200 cordless handheld vacuum that's 'just as good as Dyson' for only $40
articles.author: Carly Kulzer
articles.summary: Monozel is offering the Cordless Handheld Vacuum for cleaning hard-to-reach areas and furniture. This vacuum addresses the need for quick and easy cleanup without the hassle of a full-size vacuum cleaner.

articles.title: The creative shop AIN'T launched DOZZ, the first soup in a can on the market
articles.author: Simona Hrincescu
articles.summary: FoodVision launched DOZZ, a new line of natural soup in a can, targeting the ready-to-eat meals segment. AIN'T agency developed the branding and design for DOZZ, emphasizing its unique and convenient nature. DOZZ is launching in Romania and will soon be available in six European markets.

articles.title: Get Gucci, Prada and more designer scents for only £8 at Superdrug
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Superdrug introduced Perfume Atomiser Pods, priced at £7.99, allowing customers to sample luxury perfumes like Gucci and Prada in-store. The pods hold 5ml of fragrance, equating to approximately 65 sprays, and can be refilled. Superdrug staff are available to demonstrate the refill process.

articles.title: PancakeSwap v4 rebrands to PancakeSwap Infinity with major upgrade
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: PancakeSwap has introduced PancakeSwap Infinity, a significant rebrand and upgrade to its Decentralized Exchange (DEX).

articles.title: Your LG TV finally gets game-changing upgrade that Samsung users have enjoyed for years
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: LG is launching the Xbox app on its 2022 and 2023 smart TVs in the UK, allowing users to access Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and stream games without an Xbox console. This update provides access to titles from developers like Activision, Bethesda, and Xbox Game Studios, offering a wide range of games playable directly on LG TVs through cloud gaming.

articles.title: On second thought, maybe Ukraine won't need that new UK drone zapper after all (possible nsfw content on page)
articles.author: Copy Link
articles.summary: Firefly Aerospace is launching its Alpha FLTA006 rocket. The initial launch was delayed but a launch window is now open. The launch is scheduled for 8:38 US Central time.

articles.title: Which Instax Camera Should You Buy
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Fujifilm's Instax lineup includes the Instax Mini, Mini Evo, Instax Square, and Wide models. This comparison helps users to find the perfect instant camera or printer.

articles.title: Give your old memories a second life with this Kodak scanner, now 20% off
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Kodak is introducing the Slide N Scan, a device designed to convert old film negatives and slides into digital photos. It is currently available for $179.99, discounted from its regular price of $224.

articles.title: Superdrug shoppers can get designer perfume for just £8 in stores - here's how
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering a new service where customers can purchase Perfume Atomiser Pods for £7.99 and receive a complimentary fill of any available perfume or aftershave in-store. The 5ml pods hold approximately 65 sprays and are refillable, allowing customers to sample designer fragrances like Gucci and Prada at a lower cost. These are available in multiple colors.

articles.title: Scindia Launches Postal Department's New Initiative for Affordable Delivery of Educational Books
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Union Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia launched 'Gyan Post', a new initiative by the Postal Department on Monday. This service provides affordable delivery of books, study materials, and textbooks at concessional rates through post offices, with rates starting from Rs 20. The Gyan Post service is expected to facilitate delivery of 70 lakh shipments annually and will be operational at all Departmental Post offices across India from May 1, 2025.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands Launches Fort's AI-Based Pest Control App on the Apple App Store
articles.author: Jeffs
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands' subsidiary, Fort Products Limited, launched its AI-powered pest control mobile app on the Apple App Store. The app identifies pests using AI and offers customized treatment recommendations and curated product suggestions featuring Fort's pest control solutions. An Android version is expected to be available on Google Play in the near future.

articles.title: Unicorn Dreams Slush to debut at Sonic! How to get a collectible wish-awakening unicorn horn straw
articles.author: Chris Sims
articles.summary: Sonic Drive-In is launching the Unicorn Dreams Slush, a pink cotton candy slush with blue raspberry flavor bubbles, available nationwide starting May 5, 2025, with early access via the SONIC App from April 28, 2025. Each purchase includes a free collectible Legendary Wish-Awakening Unicorn Horn Straw while supplies last.

articles.title: Unicorn Dreams Slush to debut at Sonic! How to get a collectible wish-awakening unicorn horn straw
articles.author: Chris Sims
articles.summary: Sonic Drive-In is launching a new product called Unicorn Dreams Slush on May 5, 2025, which features a pink cotton candy slush swirled with blue raspberry flavor bubbles, topped with whipped cream and shimmering pink cotton candy sugar crystals. A collectible Legendary Wish-Awakening Unicorn Horn Straw will be included free with each purchase while supplies last, and the slush starts at $3.99 for a 20 oz drink.

articles.title: Slate Truck: A Low-Cost, Transforming EV Pickup
articles.author: Robert Lee
articles.summary: Slate, a new EV startup, introduced its first product, a customizable two-door electric pickup truck. The Slate truck is designed to be affordable, costing less than $20,000 after the federal EV tax credit, and is targeted towards wage earners. The truck features a single-motor, rear-wheel-drive setup, a 52.7-kilowatt-hour battery with a projected range of 150 miles.

articles.title: Zaxbys Goes BIG with New Giant Quesadillas for a Limited-Time Only
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Zaxby's launched new Giant Quesadillas, available starting April 28, 2025. The quesadillas come in two flavors: Chicken Bacon Ranch and Chicken Fajita. They are available for a limited time and contain three Chicken Fingerz™ and cheese, with the option to purchase them as a meal or individually.

articles.title: Bubble Splash Laundry Launches Pick-Up and Delivery Service to Serve Mableton and Surrounding Communities
articles.author: Duane Copeland
articles.summary: Bubble Splash Laundry launched a new pick-up and delivery service. This service aims to serve Mableton and its surrounding communities.

articles.title: ⚡Transform Your Skincare Routine With These Cosmetic Skincare Brands
articles.summary: Leading skincare brands introduce revolutionary Hydra Glow and Antioxidant Innovations. These innovations feature a skin fill makeover in dopamine packaging. This marks a new era in beauty with the introduction of these skincare products and service.

articles.title: Asda to trial first stand-alone George concept store in Leeds with collections by Stacey Solomon, Billie Faiers and Erica Davies
articles.author: Stephanie Smith
articles.summary: Asda is launching a new "George concept store" in Leeds, piloting a new retail format. The store will feature clothing, homeware, toys, essential baby items, a cafe, and updated customer service options such as streamlined checkouts, self-serve, and click & collect. The store will feature the new George Spring/Summer 2025 collection, fronted by model Yasmin Le Bon, alongside celebrity collaborations including the Erica Davies Kids line and Billie Faiers' latest sunshine-ready range.

articles.title: Asda to trial first stand-alone George concept store in Leeds with ranges by Stacey Solomon, Billie Faiers and Erica Davies
articles.author: Stephanie Smith
articles.summary: Asda is launching its first stand-alone George concept store in Leeds, showcasing the George clothing and homeware brand with new collections like the Spring/Summer 2025 collection fronted by Yasmin Le Bon, and the At Home with Stacey Solomon Spring/Summer Collection. The store will also feature an upgraded customer experience with streamlined checkouts and a new Kitchen concept eatery offering fresh pizza.

articles.title: Asda to trial first stand-alone George concept store in Leeds with collections by Stacey Solomon, Billie Faiers and Erica Davies
articles.author: Stephanie Smith
articles.summary: Asda is piloting a new George stand-alone concept store in Leeds, showcasing George clothing and homeware, toys, baby items, and a café. The store will feature a bigger George clothing range, the new George Spring/Summer 2025 collection, and celebrity collaborations, along with a selection of interior, garden, and lifestyle items. Asda is also upgrading the customer experience with streamlined checkouts, self-serve options, Click & Collect, and a new Kitchen concept eatery with an expanded menu including fresh pizza.

articles.title: 34 Cleaning Products That'll Make People Think You Hired A Professional
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article features a variety of cleaning products available for purchase on Amazon, including the Bissell Little Green cleaner, which has been popularized on TikTok for its effectiveness on upholstery. Other products range from scrubbers and mops to specialized stain removers, offering solutions for diverse cleaning needs.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s: Company to launch its first compact smartphone in India
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching a new compact flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13s, powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. The phone features a 6.32-inch display, a dual-camera setup with a 50MP Sony LYT-700 main sensor, and a 6260mAh battery with 80W fast charging. It will be available in India in Black Velvet and Pink Satin color variants.

articles.title: Chinese brand shares cheap EV that looks like a Land Rover with retro feature
articles.author: Jack Mortimer
articles.summary: MG has revealed the Cyber X, a new all-electric SUV, at the Shanghai Motor Show. The Cyber X features pop-up headlights, a design inspired by off-roaders, and utilizes MG's E3 platform for battery flexibility.

articles.title: 'Beyond brilliant' Henry cordless vacuum that 'outlasts Shark' gets £110 Amazon price cut
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: The Henry Quick Hen.100 Cordless Stick Vacuum is currently on sale on Amazon for £189.05, down from £299.99. It features a pod system for dust-free emptying and offers up to 60 minutes of cordless cleaning. The article also mentions deals on Levoit and Bosch cordless vacuums.

articles.title: Fuzzy's Taco Shop to Open First California Location in Barstow
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fuzzy's Taco Shop launched its first California location in Barstow on April 28, 2025, offering its signature tacos and margaritas. The Soleimani Group owns and operates the new restaurant. The first 50 guests received free tacos for a year and a Fuzzy's Taco Shop t-shirt to celebrate the grand opening.

articles.title: NovaCHARGE and Charge Rigs to Showcase the FLEXX Mobile DC Fast Charger Line at ACT Expo 2025
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: NovaCharge's Flexx, an all-electric mobile charging series, is returning to the spotlight. Flexx is presented as an energy deployment system designed for resilience.

articles.title: Contextual artificial intelligence will be the new competitive edge
articles.author: Rajat Mishra
articles.summary: EY invested $1.4 billion into its AI strategy. Contextually intelligent AI enables companies to generate content, such as presentations, that align with an organization's branding, reflect internal best practices, and resonate with specific audiences. Contextual intelligence is benificial to biopharma companies by generating polished and high-impact presentations.

articles.title: Blaze Car Perfumes Set to Redefine Driving Experience in India
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Blaze is launching Blaze Car Perfumes in India, aiming to transform driving experiences with innovative fragrances. These perfumes are formulated for India's climate and target Gen Z and Millennials with unique scents like Trance, Lush, and Tonique, positioned in the affordable luxury segment. Pre-launch feedback highlights lasting performance and innovative designs.

articles.title: Next shoppers race to buy £34 'striking' mini dress as mini heatwave approaches
articles.author: and Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next has launched the Cream Mono Placement Floral Linen Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress, priced at £34. Crafted from a linen blend, the dress is available in multiple designs and colors, including a cream and watercolor floral print. Customers have praised the dress for its style and fit, giving it a 4.5-star rating.

articles.title: River Island's 'colour of the season' dress is 'a buttery dream'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: River Island launched the Yellow Sleeveless Corset Detail Midi Dress, retailing at £99 and available in yellow or white in sizes six through 18. The dress features a v-neck, sleeveless cut, adjustable straps, midi length, zip closure, and a corset detail, generating excitement on social media.

articles.title: Lidl is selling no-effort gadget that's £410 less than Bosch version – it's perfect for getting gardens ready for summer
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl introduced the Parkside Robot Lawnmower, priced at £199 (£249 for non-Lidl Plus members), as an affordable alternative to the Bosch Indego S 500. Aldi also launched a Robotic Lawnmower for £199.99, controlled via Bluetooth app.

articles.title: Any questions? Frequent presenter says startup will engage audiences
articles.author: Max Scheinblum
articles.summary: PresEngage launched an AI-powered chatbot service on February 11th, designed to enhance audience engagement during presentations by answering questions via text. The service allows presenters to upload their slide decks and other relevant information for the chatbot to learn, offering subscriptions ranging from $16 to $54 a month and single slideshow purchases for $9 to $29.

articles.title: 5 cleaning must-dos to power through the season
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Vacmaster introduced a shop vac with a detachable leaf blower, designed for both wet and dry messes. EZ-Clean is promoting its enzyme-based deodorizer for tackling tough odors in areas like garbage bins and pet crates. ZEP highlights its Heavy-Duty Citrus Degreaser, while CLR promotes its Calcium, Lime, and Rust Remover for addressing hard water buildup.

articles.title: Maxi Sets Sights on Growth Beyond Québec: Caraquet, New Brunswick Welcomes New Store
articles.summary: Loblaw's Maxi banner will open a new store in Caraquet, New Brunswick, marking the first location outside of Quebec. The new 15,000 square foot store will be located at Place Saint-Pierre and is expected to open this fall, creating over 30 new jobs.

articles.title: Maxi Sets Sights on Growth Beyond Québec: Caraquet, New Brunswick Welcomes New Store Français
articles.author: Français
articles.summary: Maxi, Loblaw's discount banner, will open a new store in Caraquet, New Brunswick, marking its first location outside of Quebec. This 15,000 square foot store, featuring a simplified shopping experience, is scheduled to open this fall and will create over 30 new jobs.

articles.title: Chai Unveils Agentic AI Voice Agent Demo—Advancing the New Era of Autonomous Business Operations
articles.author: Evertise
articles.summary: Chai has launched a public demo of its Agentic AI-powered Voice Agent, an AI solution designed to autonomously handle real conversations, business decisions, and execute tasks within complex workflows. The Voice Agent, built upon Chai's proprietary Agentic AI framework, aims to reduce operational bottlenecks, improve service response times, and empower teams in sectors like logistics, field services, and customer support.

articles.title: GiffGaff is giving away £100 to trial its new £10 a month broadband
articles.author: Levi Winchester
articles.summary: GiffGaff is launching a low-cost broadband package with speeds of 500Mbps, offered as a trial to 500 customers for £10 per month for a year, with a £100 bonus for feedback. This new service positions GiffGaff as a competitor in the broadband market, challenging existing offerings from companies like Sky and Virgin Media.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret is selling a £35 crinkle swimsuit that looks similar to £175 Hunza G design
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new swimsuit range featuring crinkle-style bikinis and one-piece swimsuits, offering a more affordable alternative to Hunza G.  Bravissimo offers crinkle swimming costumes, and Boohoo also has a range of crinkle swimsuit designs.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s India launch teased: Specs and expected price
articles.summary: OnePlus has teased the launch of the OnePlus 13s in India, revealing details about its design, colors, and specifications. The phone is expected to feature a 6.32-inch display, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a dual camera setup with a 50-megapixel primary sensor, and a 6,260mAh battery with 80W fast charging. The price is expected to be around Rs 45,000 to 50,000 in India.

articles.title: Porsche Design Tower Bangkok and Curvistan Bangkok Host an Exclusive Preview of the "Electrifying Past. Present. Future." Exhibition
articles.summary: Porsche Design Tower Bangkok hosted the "Electrifying Past. Present. Future." exhibition, highlighting Porsche's electric and hybrid drivetrain technology. The tower features EV-ready garages, supporting electric mobility. More details about the tower's units will be revealed during the mid-2025 launch.

articles.title: Why the Audi RS Q8 is one of the best performance SUVs money can buy
articles.author: Phuti Mpyane
articles.summary: Audi has revamped the RS Q8 Performance SUV with exterior and technical enhancements including a new grille, OLED rear lights, and interior upgrades with leather and Alcantara finishes. The updated 4.0 l twin-turbo V8 engine now delivers 471kW, enabling acceleration from 0-100km/h in 3.6 seconds, contributing to the RS Q8 being the fastest SUV on the Nürburgring Nordschleife in 2024.

articles.title: Dubai's dubizzle launches new ‘Sell with AI' feature
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: dubizzle, a Dubai-based online marketplace, has launched 'Sell with AI,' a new artificial intelligence tool aimed at enhancing the user experience on its platform by automating ad creation and simplifying interactions. This initiative aligns with Dubai's economic agenda 'D33' which aims to accelerate innovation and digital transformation.

articles.title: LUMINESCE: Redefining Skincare with Natural Ingredients and Light-Based Innovation
articles.author: Created by
articles.summary: LUMINESCE, a skincare company, has introduced light therapy technology into its lymphatic drainage tools, offering skin rejuvenation and lymphatic system stimulation. The company's products are formulated with natural ingredients and have a high rating on the YUKA app. LUMINESCE is also exploring future innovations such as AI-powered customization for skincare.

articles.title: Olive Young unveils makeover for stores with experiential beauty rollout
articles.summary: Olive Young is expanding its experiential beauty services to approximately 100 stores in major commercial districts by the end of the year, starting with the Seohyun Central store on Wednesday. These services include Skin Scan Pro, a scalp and skin diagnosis service, and product recommendations via the Selly customer counseling app, aiming to provide hyper-personalized shopping experiences.

articles.title: SHISEIDO Launches Upgraded Global Suncare Range with Breakthrough SynchroShieldRepair Technology
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Shiseido is launching its upgraded Global Suncare range in Singapore in April 2025, featuring the new SynchroShieldRepair Technology and an Algae Complex for enhanced hydration. The revamped collection also emphasizes sustainability with new packaging using plant-derived plastic and includes products like PERFECT SUN PROTECTOR LOTION and ULTIMATE SUN PROTECTOR LOTION MINERAL.

articles.title: Want skincare, Turkish dessert, activewear? Try these new North Jersey shops
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Face Foundrie, a facecare business offering brows, lashes, and skincare, opened in Edgewater on April 5. Helvaci Ali, a Turkish dessert business selling coffees, ice cream, and cheesecake, opened in Paterson on March 28. A new retail store offering apparel, accessories, activewear, beauty and candle merchandise opened in Hackensack on April 2.

articles.title: Freshsales CRM review: Unified sales and customer engagement for growing teams
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Freshsales, a CRM from Freshworks, is designed for SMBs, providing a built-in telephony system and AI-driven automation. It offers features like lead and contact management, pipeline management, and email campaigns. Freshsales focuses on ease of use with a modern UI and fast implementation, targeting small teams needing an integrated sales and engagement platform.

articles.title: Grow Your Business Online with Data-Driven Digital Marketing
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers provides digital marketing services encompassing website design and development, SEO and PPC (Google Ads), social media marketing, branding and creative, and conversion rate optimization. These services are tailored to individual business goals and designed to improve online presence and drive tangible results. The company caters to both startups and established businesses, offering customized strategies and transparent reporting.

articles.title: Bed shop Dreams opens in Blyth as part of expansion plan
articles.author: Specialist Reporter
articles.summary: Dreams, a bed retailer, has opened a new store in Blyth. The new store offers mattresses, pillows, bed frames and bases to customers and has created five new jobs.

articles.title: OnePlus Open 2: Everything We Know So Far About the Next Big Foldable Phone
articles.summary: OnePlus is developing the Open 2 foldable phone, though its release has been delayed. Early information indicates it will be thinner than its predecessor, feature a Hasselblad-branded camera module with three 50MP cameras, and have an IPX8 water resistance rating. The phone is expected to have an 8-inch AMOLED main screen, a 6.4-inch AMOLED cover screen, and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with up to 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage.

articles.title: Tesla Cybertruck Spotted In India: What You Need To Know About The Electric Pickup's Arrival
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.summary: Tesla's Cybertruck was spotted in India, sparking speculation about a potential launch in the Indian market. The Cybertruck, known for its bold design and electric capabilities, offers multiple powertrain options and impressive towing capacity. Its presence suggests Tesla might be considering introducing its full range of vehicles to India.

articles.title: Thanks to this super cheap robot vacuum, I no longer hate my black kitchen floor
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Switchbot has launched the K10+, a compact robot vacuum cleaner designed for small spaces. It measures 9.8 inches in diameter and 3.6 inches tall, priced at $399.99, and is available at discounted rates via Switchbot's website and Amazon.

articles.title: ALX launches creative tech lite to empower Africas digital creators
articles.author: Godwin Anyebe
articles.summary: ALX Nigeria has launched Creative Tech Lite, a new initiative designed to equip creators with in-demand digital skills. Creative Tech Lite offers specialized tracks in AI for Creatives, Music & Audio Production, Content Creation, and Graphic Design. The program aims to empower Africa's digital creators in the creative economy.

articles.title: 5D launches AI division to revolutionise how businesses leverage insights
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: 5D has launched 5D-AI, a new division focused on providing businesses with AI tools and technologies. 5D-AI offers custom-built solutions like chatbots and machine learning models to extract insights from market data. This launch is part of 5D's rebranding and strategy to increase its market share and accelerate growth.

articles.title: Mercedes-AMG teases all-new Porsche Taycan rival
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: Mercedes-AMG unveiled a new electric super-sedan. This new model is designed to compete with the Porsche Taycan.

articles.title: Mercedes-AMG teases all-new Porsche Taycan rival
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: Mercedes-AMG is introducing a new electric super-sedan. This new model is intended to rival the Porsche Taycan.

articles.title: True Fresh Introduces New Eco-Friendly Cleaning Solutions for Home Appliances
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: True Fresh has expanded its product line. The expansion includes advanced eco-friendly cleaning solutions. These solutions are designed for home appliances and aim to ensure optimal performance and longer appliance lifespan.

articles.title: Top 5 Lip Glosses for Hydrated, Glossy, and Stunning Lips
articles.summary: A new moisturizing lip and cheek tint infused with Macadamia Oil, Mango Butter, and Jojoba Oil is now available. This product offers a natural flush, dewy effect, intense glass-like shine without stickiness, and reacts with the lip's pH to reveal a unique color.

articles.title: Best Sunscreen for All Skin Types: Ultimate Protection Against UV Rays
articles.summary: Dot & Key launched a watermelon-fresh sunscreen for oily and combination skin, containing 1% Hyaluronic Acid. Joy offers a Tinted Mattifying Sunscreen providing skincare and light makeup. Another sunscreen includes Kesar and Kojic Acid to protect from UV rays while lightening the complexion.

articles.title: Omoda C3: New Chinese small SUV brings Lamborghini, sci-fi design cues
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Chery revealed a new compact SUV for its Omoda spinoff brand. This new SUV features styling inspired by robots and starships.

articles.title: Omoda C3: New Chinese small SUV brings Lamborghini, sci-fi design cues
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Chery's Omoda brand introduced a new, aggressively styled compact SUV. The design inspiration for the SUV is derived from robots and starships.

articles.title: 43 Beauty Products That'll Make You Feel Like A Million Bucks (But Without Costing It)
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: This article highlights several newly introduced beauty and personal care products available on Amazon. Some examples are Olay Super Serum Body Wash, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, E.l.f's Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, and the Medicube Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Each product description includes the key ingredients, reviewer's opinions, and expected effects.

articles.title: 3 quick, easy AI chatbot prompts that can help you do your job better
articles.author: Doug Aamoth
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google's Gemini, and Anthropic's Claude are generative AI chatbots that assist in creating content, summarizing information, and generating ideas. These services can be used for various tasks such as drafting marketing copy, outlining blog posts, summarizing documents, and brainstorming marketing campaign ideas.

articles.title: Nexxen launches AI-powered platform ‘nexAI'
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Nexxen has launched nexAI, a comprehensive suite of AI-powered assistants and features integrated across its end-to-end advertising technology platform. nexAI enhances planning, activation, optimization, and monetization, leveraging machine learning and generative AI to improve campaign performance and revenue generation for advertisers, agencies, and publishers. The first generative AI advancement includes an in-platform assistant integrated into Nexxen DSP.

articles.title: TULA Skincare Boosts Conversions by 300 Percent with UserTesting
articles.summary: TULA Skincare launched Radiant Skin Tint, a new product in the makeup-skincare category. To ensure customer satisfaction, TULA Skincare utilized UserTesting's Human Insights Platform to refine the shade finder tool on their website. Consequently, Radiant Skin Tint became one of TULA's most successful recent product launches, driving a significant increase in customer conversion rates and attracting new customers.

articles.title: Indie Bookstore Day celebrated in central Iowa
articles.summary: WeAreIowa app facilitates streaming WeAreIowa content on your phone.

articles.title: Hoover beats Shark and Amazon with £140 off 'powerful' cordless vacuum in 56% price drop
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Hoover is offering a 56% discount on its HF9 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner With Anti Hair Wrap, reducing the price from £249 to £109 with a discount code. The HF9 features anti-twist technology, a long-lasting battery, and is designed for both carpet and hard floors, rivalling products from Shark and Dyson.

articles.title: MG Cyberster GTS coupe heading to Australia
articles.author: Alborz Fallah
articles.summary: MG digitally unveiled the new hardtop MG Cyberster GTS at the Shanghai auto show. The company plans to release the car in Chinese dealerships soon, with a potential launch in Australia following.

articles.title: MG Cyberster GTS coupe heading to Australia
articles.author: Alborz Fallah
articles.summary: MG unveiled the Cyberster GTS hardtop at the Shanghai auto show. The company plans to release the Cyberster GTS in Chinese dealerships soon, with a possible future launch in Australia.

articles.title: Best playground
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Amazon launched 'Haul,' a new storefront where everything is under $20. This initiative represents a novel service from Amazon.

articles.title: Best branded foods beating supermarket favourites ranked by Brit shoppers
articles.author: Ashley Bautista
articles.summary: Branston Baked Beans, Davidstow Classic Cheddar, Kenco's Gold Indulgence Instant Coffee and Yeo Valley Organic Greek Style Natural Yoghurt received high satisfaction ratings in a taste test, with prices starting from £1, £4.75, £7.20 respectively. These products are available for purchase in various supermarkets like Asda, Morrisons, Ocado, Sainsbury's, and Tesco.

articles.title: BYD starts deliveries of its first electric off-roader with a roof-mounted drone
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: BYD, under its Fang Cheng Bao brand, has launched and started deliveries of its first fully electric off-road SUV, the Tai 3, in China. The Tai 3 features BYD's LFP blade batteries, has a starting price of $A30,500, and offers features such as a roof-mounted drone carrier system and a spacious frunk, targeting the family adventure SUV market.

articles.title: Sit back and relax with these quality robot vacuum cleaners
articles.author: Tiarne Blackwell
articles.summary: The article showcases new robot vacuum cleaners from various brands. Ecovacs Deebot T50 Max Pro Omni features a new 'BLAST' suction system. Dyson 360 Vis Nav uses 360-degree vision. Samsung's Bespoke Jet Bot+ comes with a clean station and LiDAR sensor.

articles.title: Spray, Glow, and Go With the Best Moisturizing Body Mists
articles.author: Conçetta Ciarlo
articles.summary: The article highlights various moisturizing body mists available in the market. Topicals launched Like Butter Moisturizing and Soothing Mist in 2020. Aquaphor offers Healing Ointment Body Spray, while Kiehl's presents Creme de Corps Nourishing Dry Body Oil. Flamingo introduced Light Hydrating Spray, Kopari launched Golden Sunglaze Body Mist Sunscreen SPF 50, La Prairie offers Cellular Energizing Mist Body Spray, Hanni provides Water Balm Hydrating Body Mist, and Whind offers Medina Drench Body Mist.

articles.title: 37 Products With Before And After Pics That'll Have You Doing A Double-Take To Make Sure You're Not Hallucinating
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article features a diverse range of new products, including a suede and nubuck brush for restoring leather goods, an ear treatment for pets to eliminate gunk and infections, and Catrice 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener to liven up tired eyes. There's also Essence Lash Princess Mascara adored for its volume and length, and Sol de Janerio's Brazilian Bum Bum body cream to smooth and tighten skin.

articles.title: New Mountain Dew Flavor Revives Wild Theory About Soda Brand's Connection to Catastrophic Events
articles.author: Rob Carroll
articles.summary: Mountain Dew is launching a new flavor called Mango Rush on May 5th. This tropical beverage blends the citrus taste of Mountain Dew with a bold kick of mango flavor and will be exclusively available at Little Caesars pizza chain locations.

articles.title: ChatGPT adds shopping help, intensifying Google rivalry
articles.author: MARCO BERTORELLO
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced a new shopping capability for ChatGPT, enhancing its functionality to help users find products online. This move signals OpenAI's ambition to compete with Google in the search engine market.

articles.title: ChatGPT adds shopping help, intensifying Google rivalry
articles.author: MARCO BERTORELLO
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced a new shopping capability to ChatGPT. This enhancement aims to help users find products online and intensifies OpenAI's competition with Google in the search engine market.

articles.title: Sentra Introduces Data Security for AI Agents Solution to Secure the Next Generation of Business Automation
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: Sentra is introducing new capabilities supporting popular AI agent toolkits from Microsoft, Amazon, and OpenAI. These capabilities will be available within Sentra's cloud-native platform. This suggests an enhancement of Sentra's services by integrating with AI toolkits.

articles.title: Lenovo's affordable mobile notetaking tablet just dropped below $200
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Lenovo's Tab K11 LTE is now available for purchase.

articles.title: VEPO Solutions Introduces AI Customer Service Agent, Cindy, to Enhance Customer Experience
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: VEPO Solutions launched Cindy, a new AI-powered Customer Service Agent, enhancing customer service with cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Best C9 10mm Auto 30-Round Mags Loadout in Black Ops 6 & Warzone
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Black Ops 6 and Warzone launched unique content drops. The drops featured brand-new weapons.

articles.title: Today you can save $100 on the Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus — the pre-assembled Surface ...
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Lenovo offers its Yoga Tab Plus for $100 off.

articles.title: Spar to up its private label game
articles.author: Moneyweb
articles.summary: An unnamed company is launching a new range of premium "Signature Selection products." This product line is designed to compete directly with offerings from Woolworths and Checkers in the market.

articles.title: Uber Announces Major Change for Customers
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A company is introducing a new offer to its customers. The details of the offer are not specified, but it represents a recent introduction from the company.

articles.title: ‘Elden Ring Nightreign' Reveals PC System Spec Requirements
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Elden Ring Nightreign's PC specification requirements have been released, informing users about the hardware needed to run the new release or update.

articles.title: HeyDude is finally restocking the Jelly Roll shoes — but you'll have to shop ASAP ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Jelly Roll and HeyDude collaborated on a second product drop.

articles.title: One More Nail In The Coffin Of Ad Agencies
articles.author: John Winsor
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched an ad campaign for its Surface line that was almost entirely created by AI tools like Hailuo and Kling, except for close-ups. This resulted in a 90% reduction in time and cost while maintaining broadcast-quality standards. Brands can now automate and streamline their required content and Freelancers, empowered by AI tools, can deliver exceptional results.

articles.title: 3 Businesses You Can Start For Less Than $100 In 2025
articles.author: Rachel Wells
articles.summary: Several low-cost business ideas, including AI content reviewing through platforms like Outlier, short-form video editing using tools such as CapCut and Canva, and social media management with tools like Jasper and Canva, are presented. These businesses can be started for under $100, utilizing affordable platforms like GoDaddy, Wix, and Google Workspace for domain and email services, and leveraging free or inexpensive tools for content creation and management.

articles.title: What is DLSS?
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The content introduces and aims to explain DLSS, a gaming technology. DLSS is presented as a relatively new offering and seeks to answer questions about it.

articles.title: GUESS Launches Fashion-First 'Guess Bus' Experience in Sydney
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: GUESS launched a fashion-first 'Guess Bus' experience in Sydney. The 'Guess Bus' is a new service introduced by the company.
